fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
**Meow**: Meow at a player; forcing them to visit themselves if the role has anything to do with the dead.
**Hiss**: Scare the target, roleblocking them for this night and the next.
**Tame**: Visit a player; become there faction. You may only use this if all other Minecraft roles are dead.
**Gift**: Gift your owner a random item that you can. If you do not have an owner, give the Minecraft head role the owner.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
**Pure**: You may not promote to a Minecraft head role.
**Drop String**: Upon death you give the Minecraft head role two string.
- Gift may give Rabbits Foot, Rabbit Hide, String, Rotten Flesh, Feather, Raw Chicken, Phantom Membrane

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Slay all else and turn them into gear
